Summary: Fields | Methods | Inherited Methods | [Expand All]
public final class

CacheSpan

extends Object
implements Comparable<CacheSpan>
java.lang.Object
   ↳ com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.cache.CacheSpan

Class Overview

Defines a span of data that may or may not be cached (as indicated by isCached).

Summary

Fields
public final File file The file corresponding to this CacheSpan, or null if isCached is false.
public final boolean isCached Whether the CacheSpan is cached.
public final String key The cache key that uniquely identifies the original stream.
public final long lastAccessTimestamp The last access timestamp, or -1 if isCached is false.
public final long length The length of the CacheSpan, or -1 if this is an open-ended hole.
public final long position The position of the CacheSpan in the original stream.
Public Methods
int compareTo(CacheSpan another)
static CacheSpan createCacheEntry(File file)
Creates a cache span from an underlying cache file.
static CacheSpan createClosedHole(String key, long position, long length)
static CacheSpan createLookup(String key, long position)
static CacheSpan createOpenHole(String key, long position)
static File getCacheFileName(File cacheDir, String key, long offset, long lastAccessTimestamp)
boolean isOpenEnded()
CacheSpan touch()
Renames the file underlying this cache span to update its last access time.
[Expand]

Public Methods

public int compareTo (CacheSpan another)

public static CacheSpan createCacheEntry (File file)

Creates a cache span from an underlying cache file.

Parameters
file The cache file.
Returns
  • The span, or null if the file name is not correctly formatted.

public static CacheSpan createClosedHole (String key, long position, long length)

public static CacheSpan createLookup (String key, long position)

public static File getCacheFileName (File cacheDir, String key, long offset, long lastAccessTimestamp)

public boolean isOpenEnded ()

Returns
  • True if this is an open-ended CacheSpan. False otherwise.

public CacheSpan touch ()

Renames the file underlying this cache span to update its last access time.

Returns
  • A CacheSpan representing the updated cache file.
